title: 1.12.2安装forge后进游戏崩溃
author: 烈桀
txt_content:
[14:56:55] [main/WARN]: The coremod FMLCorePlugin (net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLCorePlugin) is not signed!
[14:56:55] [main/WARN]: The coremod FMLForgePlugin (net.minecraftforge.classloading.FMLForgePlugin) is not signed!
[14:56:55] [main/WARN]: Found FMLCorePluginContainsFMLMod marker in iceandfire-1.8.3.jar. This is not recommended, @Mods should be in a separate jar from the coremod.
[14:56:55] [main/WARN]: The coremod iceandfire (com.github.alexthe666.iceandfire.asm.IceAndFirePlugin) is not signed!
[14:56:58] [main/ERROR]: FML appears to be missing any signature data. This is not a good thing
Exception in thread "main" 

游戏版本     1.12.2
forge版本    14.23.5.2847
系统版本     Win7 X64
Java版本     1.8.0_231 X64
其他MOD    无

这六行是错误代码，我看着是签名错误？有人知道怎么解决吗？原版能进，安装完forge就崩溃

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
烈桀 发表于 2019-10-28 16:16
Command: "E:\\Program Files\\Java\\jre1.8.0_231\\bin\\java.exe" -Dminecraft.client.jar=.minecraft\ ...
那是因为你装 mod 不装前置。

https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... ry/download/2704186

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
你是怎么安装forge的 安装forge前需要先启动一下原版  未启动安装后启动会崩溃 
实在不行使用安装好forge的整合包

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
不完整，上传完整的报错。

你是怎么安装 forge 的，试试手动安装
https://www.mcbbs.net//thread-875660-1-1.html

replies.author: 烈桀
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-10-28 22:14 编辑 
xmdhs 发表于 2019-10-28 15:33
不完整，上传完整的报错。

你是怎么安装 forge 的，试试手动安装
